When the sweater was completely open, the metal straps on her wrists guided her arms along the arm rests and up the back of the seat until they were next to her head. The strip around her waist released.

The two metal arms then moved from their position where they had accessed the buttons of her sweater to Dani's waist. Grabbing the two separate edges of the sweater, two more arms grabbed the back of the sweater and as one, all four limbs started to rise up, pulling the sweater up.

Dani struggled as much as she was able, but her arms were still trapped. The sweater was already up to her arm pits and around her head. When Dani's arms were released, she quickly brought them down by her waist, but her arms pulled out of her sleeves and the metal arms moved quickly to clear the garment from her head and completely off of her.

Dani had just lost her sweater, and was not even sure where it had gone. She shivered in the cold of the auditorium now that she was without her sweater.

15212.content:
"Quattore--you Denebian slime devil! Surrender now or no quarter shall be given later!" Captain Scarlett bellowed as she pointed her holo-cutlass at her formidable foe. The heroine's outfit was dirty and bloodied from fighting with Quattore's strong but losing crew.

"As I told ye before, Captain Scarlett. Ye stand before Captain Quattore. Courtesy is important, for pirate, merchant, marine, or planetlubber." Quattore smirked as he finished his statement; trusting her instincts, Scarlett spun around and deftly used her holo-cutlass to separate a nearly literal backstabbing pirates head from his body.

Scarlett had no time to gloat, as her towering nemesis moved upon her with this mighty arms, two of them wielding holo-cutlasses. Scarlett used her superior agility to dodge and parry his blows, but she could not find an opening. His incredible strength was taxing of her already worn muscles. She scanned with urgent eyes around for an advantage.

Quattore's smirk softened and his four eyes changed from red to violet. "Ye do impress me, Captain Scarlett. Few men of Terra could last more than one blow against me, yet ye of the gentler sex present a challenge. If ye yield to me, there is much we can share: power, spoils, my bed, trayan grog, your bed."

Scarlett shook her head vehemently. "Flattered, but I prefer other humans. And I'd never surrender as long as I have a cutlass in my hand and my emblem on my chest." She delivered a fierce kick to his knee, which would have dislodged a human's kneecap but merely stunned the powerful alien. Using the moment, she dashed over and grabbed what appeared to be a heavy net on a barrel.

Quattore chuckled as he reached into his black overcoat and pressed a button on the controls. He wasn't a moment to soon, as Scarlett was about to throw the net onto him. Suddenly, the net seemed to dissolve into cosmic dust that covered her.

"Argh!" Scarlett screamed as the dust seemed to make her holo-cutlass as well as her entire ensemble. Reflexively, she put her left hand in front of her red-haired muff and her right arm across her perky boobs.

While Dani was trying to piece together what just happened to the heroine, a more pressing problem came. Well, not so much pressing as pulling. Mechanical arms from her seat emerged out and in the time it took for a holo-cutlass to turn on, pulled off all her clothes, even her socks and footwear.

Dani barely had time to marvel at the speed and efficiency of her being put in the buff before the arms retracted away with her clothes. Dani blushed deeply and mimicked Scarlett in covering herself.

She felt like screaming, but knew that would attract a lot of unwanted attention. She considered seeking an usher for help, but that would also leave her nubile nude form open for ogling. Besides, Dan felt semi-paralyzed with embarrassment from her situation.

15213.content:
Captain Scarlett swung through the air, clutching a rope from the sail in one hand and a holo-cutlass in the other. Blaster fire whizzed past her as she flew over the deck of the enemy's ship, but none managed to hit her, and anyone who came close was soon preoccupied by Scarlett's loyal crew. Releasing the rope, Scarlett arced over the steering wheel, her boot landing squarely in the face of the mook using it. Rolling to a crouch, Captain Scarlett glanced up to the camera, smirking.

"Very nicely done, Captain Sssscarlett!" came a sardonic, synthesized voice from behind her. The distinct (and trademarked) hum of a holo-cutlass sliced through the air as Scarlett bolted forward and turned on her heels, her own blade pointed at her attacker. He was big- 7 feet tall and heavily muscled, his thick black overcoat making him look even bulkier. Four red eyes glared at her, surrounded by bluish-gray skin and under a black, Jolly Roger adorned skull, which also had four eyes. He had a two holo-cutlasses in a hand on either side- his lower set of arms folded sternly over his midsection. All in all, a mean, ugly looking alien bastard, who could be none other than-

"Quattore!"

"Captain Quattore, girl!" The alien Captain leveled a his holo-cutlass at his opponent, brandishing the other in the air, and Scarlett finally noticed why her waistband suddenly felt looser; on the ground between them was her belt, a scrap of leather with each neatly sliced end burnt. "You aren't getting away thisssss time!"

"We'll see about that!" Scarlett shouted, smirking again, and the two pirates charged at each other. Scarlett's skill with the sabre was unparalleled, but the brute force of Quattore's swings was a force to be reckoned with, and that was just with one sword! They clashed for a few moments, laser cuts slicing into the ship around them with each missed swing. The smirk never left Scarlett's face though!

Until, with a burst of speed Quattore was behind her, his lower set of hands reaching for her! With a spin and a kick back, she sent him reeling away from her-- her waistband caught in his hand! With his weight and strength, the garment tore easily. What's more, a swinging blade from the falling captain cut through the side of the leather trousers as he fell, also catching the lace underneath...

-----------------------------------------------------------------{/c enter}

Dani gasped, the heroine's bare bottom-half coming into full view on the big screen. Despite herself, she blushed; the outfits had been pretty skimpy so far, but she didn't realize the movie would go that far... Things only got more revealing when caught off guard from her exposure, Captain Scarlett almost let herself get slashed across the back! She dodged just in time, but the lower half of her long coat wasn't so lucky...

Geeze, Dani thought, they really aren't holding anything back, huh? Her answer came in the form of a tug at the back of her skirt. Dani jumped, and started to lift herself up to inspect the source of the disturbance, but this was the exact wrong move.

A blunted, flat metal arm from the back of her seat had hooked into the back of her skirt, shorts, even the panties underneath! When Dani lifted up, the arm responded to the tugging by moving, quickly running through a groove across the seat of her chair, dragging her bottoms down and exposing her bare ass to the cold movie theater air! Dani sat back down, but too late, as the arm had already dragged everything below her knees!

"H-Hey!" She shouted, only to get shushed by someone sitting ahead of her. The presence of other people brought back to her attention, Dani did in fact quiet down, but on the inside she was freaking out. The arm was firmly in place at the base of the seat and refused to let go, leaving her not only effectively bottomless, but with her legs bound by her own clothing.

Dani glanced around in a panic. No one was in her row, and no one seemed to have noticed yet, but how long would it take for someone to see her like this? Is this really part of the 4-D? she wondered. This seems like a bit much! Placing the mostly empty bag of popcorn between her legs for the bare minimum of cover, Dani leaned back down to try and get the arm to budge, when an explosion rocked the theater, Captain Scarlett crying out in surprise. Despite her predicament, Dani looked back up in genuine curiosity, just in time to see...

After the long flight, Dani was exhausted, and went straight to her room.

Closing the room door, Dani looked over the room, 2 beds, as requested, large bathroom with separate bath and shower, and balcony.

Forgetting to close the drapes together, Dani proceeded to undress, providing anyone looking a clear view of her strip. Discarding her clothes near one of the beds, she went to have a shower, starting to make a plan for the next day

After showering and drying herself off, Dani got into bed, still naked, to have a rest before the big day she had planned

About 3am, she awoke after several hours sleep. Realising she had forgotten to close the drapes, Dani, still naked, went over to close them, so the morning sun wouldn't shine into the room.

As she was about to pull the drapes, she thought ‘I could use some fresh air’.

Looking around she continued thinking ‘Why not stand on the balcony for a minute?’

Opening the sliding door, she was about to step out when the air brushed across her body, reminding her of her lack of clothing.
Stopping herself from stepping onto the balcony, looking over at the pile of clothes she’d discarded, she thought ‘I should really put on my clothes’, before deciding ‘Nah, I'll only be out there for a minute or two. What harm can it do, it’s 3am’

Stepping out onto the balcony, the morning air felt great on her body. Dani did a few stretches, before leaning on the railing to look at the scenery. She could see the beach and the shopping district and some historical landmarks. ‘This place is beautiful’ Dani thought to herself, when her line of thought was interrupted as she heard the sliding door close, and the unmistakable sound of a door locking
